name: Sector3f Web Tech Demo
description:
Basic controls:

  • WASD movement
  • mouse look (click to activate, Esc to exit)
  • press Shift-key to sprint

I used React with ThreeJS as well as a few other helpful libraries to make this quick and tiny first-person walking demo. This is a test run for a React-based toolbox I have been building for myself, meant for simple game sketches and short narrative demos. Source code: https://github.com/unframework/sector3f.
